Cubic.name: Cubic
Cubic.description: Offsets, scales, squares, and cubes its input signal

Func.name: Func
Func.description: A knob with a selectable range to offset or scale its input signal

Func6.name: Func 6
Func6.description: A chain of knobs with selectable ranges to offset and scale input signals

Hostage.name: Hostage
Hostage.description: Generates a hold or sustain envelope stage

Ranger.name: Ranger
Ranger.description: A modulatable knob with an adjustable, modulatable range

Swave.name: Swave
Swave.description: A waveshaper with a unique sigmoid transfer function

Tapers.name: Tapers
Tapers.description: A pair of modulatable knobs with adjustable, modulatable tapers

Xycloid.name: Xycloid
Xycloid.description: Generates a pair of complex, evolving, pulsing LFO signals
